course.subject: BIEN
course.name: Introduction to Neural Engineering and Bio-robotics
course.description: This is an introductory course for neural engineering and bio-robotics. The course introduces the fundamental principles on the neuroscience, the technologies and implementations of neural engineering, as well as the design of the neuromorphic and brain-based robots. The topics include cellular mechanisms, neuroanatomy, sensation and perception, object recognition and action control, neural coding theory, neural network models, plasticity and learning, neural interface and rehabilitation, neuromorphic robots and brain-based robots.
